page.title: 03TOURISM
page.content: Every Summer visitors to Eastnor village set up camp in the{local park. Most of the tents and caravans are parked near the four big ponds. Quite often the campers bring along small boats and fishing gear which they use on the water. On warm summer days some of the younger people are tempted by the village children to join them in a swim. Different groups of people of all ages come to stay.They include Cubs, Brownies,Guides and scouts.In the park there lives a{herd of deer.}These are very popular with the campers, especially Corrie who is very tame. The main attraction for the tourists, is{the castle}in the village. Another favourite walk for the more energetic is to{the Obelisk}which is situated on Mid-Summer Hill.
